attributes.action: make Cristiano Ronaldo a knight of the realm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
he is without a doubt the greatest football player in the world.
women want to be with him and men want to be him.
he has been the best player in the premiership so far

rejection.details: This is not the forum for this request, please see - http://www.honours.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
